output.sentences: On this year's vacation we visited quaint little towns one of which had turned a local mansion into a museum.
The furnishings were authentic for a home in the early twentieth century.
There was a well appointed billiards table in one room with ornate lighting.
Off to the left was a small bedroom with a little desk for the convenient letter writing
There was a cobalt blue room with an exhibit of lovely lamps, all of which were lit.
